tasks

Class TaskEuclideanTsp

  • Object
    • TaskEuclideanTsp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task<List<Integer>>, Serializable

    public class TaskEuclideanTsp
extends Object
implements Task<List<Integer>>
    This is an implementation of the task interface that solves the traveling salesman problem
    Author:
    Samson Svendsen, Simen Aakhus
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public TaskEuclideanTsp(double[][] cities)
        Constructor that initiates cities
        Parameters:
        cities - A 2D double array of cities, where cities[i][0] gives x-coordinate, and cities[i][1] is the y-coordinate.

      • calcAdjacencyMatrix

        public double[][] calcAdjacencyMatrix(double[][] cities)
        Calculates an adjacency matrix
        Parameters:
        cities - A 2D double array of cities, where cities[i][0] gives x-coordinate, and cities[i][1] is the y-coordinate.
        Returns:
        returns a 2D adjacency matrix

      • tsp

        public static int[] tsp(double[][] adjacencyMatrix)
        Calculates the answer to TSP.
        Parameters:
        adjacencyMatrix - 2D adjacency matrix.
        Returns:
        returns a solution to TSP in the form of an array of cities

      • isCityInPath

        public static boolean isCityInPath(int[] path,
                   int city)
        Checks wether a city is in the current path
        Parameters:
        path - current path of cities.
        city - a city
        Returns:
        true if city is in the current path, false if it is not.
